title: Catch Me If You Can
short_plot_summary: A con man poses as various professionals, such as a pilot and a doctor, while being chased by an FBI agent throughout the years.
explanation: An airplane, representing the protagonist's impersonation of a pilot
A detective, symbolizing the FBI agent tracking the protagonist
A dollar bill, illustrating the fraudulent checks and forgeries committed by the protagonist
A hospital, indicating the protagonist's time posing as a doctor
A bride, representing the protagonist's romantic relationships throughout the story
